location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H.M. Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H.M. Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requesting to send him eventual communication to His Majesty's Mission at Tabreeze [Tabriz, Iran], so that they could be dispatched on 3 February.
